links: Index entries for reversions of series
formula: Revert transform of A122100 offset 1. - _Michael Somos_, May 11 2012
prog: (PARI) {a(n) = if( n<1, 0, polcoeff( serreverse(x * (1 - 4*x + 3*x^2) / (1 - 3*x + x^3) + x * O(x^n)), n))}; /* _Michael Somos_, May 11 2012 */
